p: Uncertainties remain about the antibody response of asymptomatic healthy carriers, which is expected to be lower and about the duration of immunity. The antibody response against the other four benign human coronaviruses lasts two to three years, which would lead to optimism. For this reason, serological tests could be predictive of good protection and form the basis for herd immunity. 24 The existence of this acquired immunity is an omen for the likely effectiveness of future vaccines.
